NAME.NAME: Template Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: A descriptive name for this template that should be unique per language, per domain, and will be used when referring to templates.

LANG.NAME: Language
LANG.DESCRIPTION: The language of this template. You may create many versions of this template, one for each language.

SUBJECT.NAME: Email Subject
SUBJECT.DESCRIPTION: The subject of the email. Keep it short and to the point, and stay away from all capitals or special characters.

BODY.NAME: Email Body
BODY.DESCRIPTION: The html body of the email. Feel free to make use of the template fields to enhance the personality of the email. Avoid using images to present text.

ENABLED.NAME: Enabled
ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Enable or disable this email template

ERRORS.ADD: An error occurred while trying to add the email template. Please try again.
ERRORS.SAVE: An error occurred while trying to save the email template. Please try again.
ERRORS.EDIT: An error occurred while trying to edit the email template. Please try again.

ADD.TITLE: Add Provider
ADD.SUCCESSSHOWPROP: Showing properties for provider just added, please check to make sure if you need to specify overrides or configure anything.
ADD.ERROR: Could not add provider, please check the page for any possible missing fields/errors.

EDIT.TITLE: Edit Provider
EDIT.ORDERCHANGEDSUCCESS: New Provider Display Order Saved Successfully.
EDIT.ERROR: Could not modify provider group details, please check the page for any possible missing fields/errors.
EDIT.ORDERCHANGED: Display order has been modified, please remember to save the new order before proceeding. You can use the 'Save Order' button at the top of the page to save this new ordering.

DELETE.TITLE: Delete Provider
DELETE.WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete this provider ?
DELETE.WARNING2: If you delete this provider it will not be available anymore. This change is permanent and cannot be undone!
DELETE.ERROR: Could not delete provider, please try again later, or contact support if problem persists.

DESCRIPTION.NAME: Description
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: E.g. My favourite provider of all time..
DESCRIPTION.PLACEHOLDER: Short description to remember this setup

PROVIDER.NAME: Provider
PROVIDER.DESCRIPTION: This is the provider to be associated with this provider group

PROVIDERS.EMPTY: No providers setup yet. Use the add button at the top to add a provider.

NAME.NAME: Template Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: A descriptive name for this template that should be unique per language, per domain, and will be used when referring to templates.
NAME.UNIQUE: This template name for this domain with the selected language already exists

LANG.NAME: Language
LANG.DESCRIPTION: The language of this template. You may create many versions of this template, one for each language.

ENABLED.NAME: Enabled
ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Enable or disable this sms template

TEXT.NAME: Text
TEXT.DESCRIPTION: The text for this sms template

DESCRIPTION.NAME: Description
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: The purpose of this sms template

ERRORS.ADD: An error occurred while trying to add the sms template. Please try again.
ERRORS.SAVE: An error occurred while trying to save the sms template. Please try again.
ERRORS.EDIT: An error occurred while trying to edit the sms template. Please try again.

NAME.UNIQUE: This template name for this domain with the selected language already exists

LIST.TITLE: SMS Queue
LIST.DESCRIPTION: A list of sms's queued for your domains
